tool.name: Chado load InterProScan results

param.name: input
param.label: InterProScan results
param.help: Path to the InterProScan XML file to load

param.name: query_type
param.label: Query type
param.help: The feature type (e.g. 'gene', 'mRNA', 'polypeptide', 'contig') of the query. It must be a valid Sequence Ontology term.

param.name: match_on_name
param.label: Match On Name
param.help: Match features using their name instead of their uniquename

param.name: parse_go
param.label: Parse Go
param.help: Load GO annotation to the database

param.name: re_name
param.label: Name regular expression
param.help: Regular expression to extract the feature name from the input file (first capturing group will be used).

param.name: skip_missing
param.label: Skip Missing
param.help: Skip lines with unknown features instead of aborting everything.

tool.help:
Load an InterProScan analysis, in the same way as does the tripal_analysis_intepro module
@HELP@
